basics.name: Sophia Kim
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am persuing a degree of B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2021.

work.company: School of Ocean and Earth Science and Technology
work.summary: Aiding in building intricate reports based on the department's expenses and budget.
highlights: Update and maintain the confidential fiscal reports
Revising and improving a data sheet to better the performance

work.summary: Tutoring students who wish to have concrete understanding of the courses such as Discrete Mathematics and other introductory level ICS courses.

volunteer.organization: National Honor Society at Pearl City High School
volunteer.summary: Vice president for organizing events and volunteer activities
highlights: Tutored students after school to guide them through their high school career
Volunteered in numerous events such as the Heart Walk

awards.title: University of Hawaii at Manoa NWS Chancellor's Scaholrship
awards.summary: Scholarship awarded by the university to students who show outstanding performance throughout their high school career, and meet the expectations such as extracurricular activities and test scores.
